ground_truth.thought: 获取主要原材料期权的历史交易数据
ground_truth.name: OptionMarket.get_historical_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'OptionMarket.get_overview_report', 'description': 'Get the latest overview report of the option market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The query to specify the type of report, e.g., latest, monthly, etc.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The overview report of the option market.'}]}, {'name': 'OptionMarket.get_historical_data', 'description': 'Get historical trading data of major raw material options.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The ticker symbol of the raw material option.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'start_date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The start date of the historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}, {'name': 'end_date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The end date of the historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The historical trading data of the option.'}]}, {'name': 'OptionMarket.analyze_data', 'description': 'Analyze the trading volume and price volatility of the options.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The historical trading data of the option.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis results of the trading volume and price volatility.'}]}, {'name': 'OptionMarket.provide_recommendations', 'description': 'Provide recommendations based on the analysis results.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The analysis results of the trading volume and price volatility.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'The recommendations for option trading.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一家制造公司的财务经理，为了对冲原材料价格波动，我需要了解期权市场的现状。首先，请提供最新的期权市场概览报告。然后，获取主要原材料期权的历史交易数据。接着，分析这些期权的交易量和价格波动情况。最后，基于分析结果，提供一些期权交易的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的期权市场概览报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'report': 'The latest option market overview report shows a significant increase in trading volume for raw material options, particularly in oil and copper. The market is currently experiencing high volatility due to geopolitical events and supply chain disruptions.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The latest option market overview report shows a significant increase in trading volume for raw material options, particularly in oil and copper. The market is currently experiencing high volatility due to geopolitical events and supply chain disruptions.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 获取主要原材料期权的历史交易数据
